mapper.insert: insert into RESERVATION ( RESERVE_IDX, RESERVE_DATE, RESERVE_ID, RESERVE_CIDX, RESERVE_SIDX, RESERVE_CONFIRM ) VALUES( RESERVATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{RESERVE_DATE}, #{RESERVE_ID}, #{RESERVE_CIDX}, #{RESERVE_SIDX}, 'N' )
mapper.select: select RESERVE_IDX, RESERVE_CONFIRM, RESERVE_ID, RESERVE_DATE, CULTURE_NAME, CULTURE_LOCATION, SEAT_NAME, SEAT_PRICE from (select * from RESERVATION inner join CULTURE on RESERVATION.RESERVE_CIDX = CULTURE.CULTURE_IDX inner join SEAT on RESERVATION.RESERVE_SIDX = SEAT.SEAT_IDX ORDER BY RESERVE_IDX DESC)

select RESERVE_IDX, RESERVE_CONFIRM, RESERVE_ID, RESERVE_DATE, CULTURE_NAME, CULTURE_LOCATION, SEAT_NAME, SEAT_PRICE from (select * from RESERVATION inner join CULTURE on RESERVATION.RESERVE_CIDX = CULTURE.CULTURE_IDX inner join SEAT on RESERVATION.RESERVE_SIDX = SEAT.SEAT_IDX ORDER BY RESERVE_IDX DESC) WHERE RESERVE_ID LIKE #{search} ORDER BY RESERVE_IDX DESC

select RESERVE_IDX, RESERVE_CONFIRM, RESERVE_ID, RESERVE_DATE, CULTURE_NAME, CULTURE_LOCATION, SEAT_NAME, SEAT_PRICE from (select * from RESERVATION inner join CULTURE on RESERVATION.RESERVE_CIDX = CULTURE.CULTURE_IDX inner join SEAT on RESERVATION.RESERVE_SIDX = SEAT.SEAT_IDX ORDER BY RESERVE_IDX DESC) WHERE CULTURE_NAME LIKE #{search} ORDER BY RESERVE_IDX DESC

select RESERVE_IDX, RESERVE_CONFIRM, RESERVE_ID, RESERVE_DATE, CULTURE_NAME, CULTURE_LOCATION, SEAT_NAME, SEAT_PRICE from (select * from RESERVATION inner join CULTURE on RESERVATION.RESERVE_CIDX = CULTURE.CULTURE_IDX inner join SEAT on RESERVATION.RESERVE_SIDX = SEAT.SEAT_IDX ORDER BY RESERVE_IDX DESC) WHERE CULTURE_LOCATION LIKE #{search} ORDER BY RESERVE_IDX DESC
SELECT SEAT_IDX, SEAT_AREA, SEAT_NUMBER, SEAT_PRICE, SEAT_DATE, SEAT_CIDX, SEAT_RESERVED, SEAT_NAME FROM SEAT WHERE SEAT_CIDX = #{SEAT_CIDX}
SELECT SEAT_IDX, SEAT_AREA, SEAT_NUMBER, SEAT_PRICE, SEAT_DATE, SEAT_CIDX, SEAT_RESERVED, SEAT_NAME FROM SEAT WHERE SEAT_CIDX = #{SEAT_CIDX} AND SEAT_DATE = #{SEAT_DATE}
select * from SEAT where SEAT_CIDX = #{SEAT_CIDX} AND SEAT_DATE = #{SEAT_DATE} AND SEAT_RESERVED = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET RESERVE_CONFIRM = 'Y' WHERE RESERVE_IDX = #{RESERVE_IDX}
UPDATE RESERVATION SET RESERVE_CONFIRM = 'N' WHERE RESERVE_IDX = #{RESERVE_IDX}
